query:
SELECT
                    u.id,
                    u.display_name,
                    u.profile_picture,
                    u.street_credits,
                    u.description,
                    u.friends_count,
                    u.role
                FROM
                    app_user u
                INNER JOIN
                    user_relationship rl ON u.id = (
                        CASE
                            WHEN rl.user_a_id = $1 THEN rl.user_b_id
                            WHEN rl.user_b_id = $1 THEN rl.user_a_id
                            ELSE NULL
                        END
                    )
                WHERE
                    rl.state = $2
